nodes.bodyText:
GRADLE_USER_HOME
Specifies the Gradle user home directory (which defaults to $USER_HOME/.gradle if not set).

https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/build_environment.html#sec:gradle_environment_variables
I assumed the default value should work fine. However, the default value uses a strange variable USER_HOME, which is undefined. (This is not HOME.)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -4,13 +4,15 @@ set -o errexit
 set -o xtrace
 
 mkdir -p $HOME/.gradle
-readonly HOME_GRADLE_PROPERTY="$HOME/.gradle/gradle.properties"
+export GRADLE_USER_HOME="$HOME/.gradle"
